code: var getImageHeightRatio=function getImageHeightRatio(width){if(width>800)return 0.65;if(width>500)return 0.60;else return 0.60;};var getTweetSizes=function getTweetSizes(){var newSizes=[];var res=document.getElementsByClassName('completeTweet');Object.keys(res).forEach(function(tweet){newSizes.push(res[tweet].clientHeight);});return newSizes;};var handleTotalResize=function handleTotalResize(){var res=document.getElementsByClassName('TweetImage');Object.keys(res).forEach(function(image){res[image].height=res[image].width*getImageHeightRatio(res[image].width);});return getTweetSizes();};export default handleTotalResize;
